sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa bstan par bka' stsal gyis/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa de la spobs par gyis shig 'jam dpal ji

ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhan gyi rkyen

gyis mi 'gro ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams

cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/

'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjesu rtogs pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par

'phags pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su

dag par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams

kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par phye na mi rnyed par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/

lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras

pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi

dbyings zhi bar nyid du shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams cad la rten par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i

bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can

rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras

pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yo bar mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa

rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongasu tshal bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thub par dka'

ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis gting rtogs par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar

na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la bdag med pas sgyid

lug par mi 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston

pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed par de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor

gnas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus

ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus slas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la

mkhas pa rnams yin/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing lta bar byed la/ mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor

ba tshol zhing lta bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcod pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yan no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad mi 'pho bar

lta bar byed pa lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i

rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag po med par shes par byed pa

de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la smod par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i

bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dag la thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongasu dag pas

brtul shugs grub pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rtogs pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin/

'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed/ lta bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe

'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal

gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams

yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad

snang ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srogs chags thams

cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed pa de ltar lha'i bu

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams

cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i

bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras

pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang bsgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin no/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la

slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing / tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig shes par byed pa de

lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing /

yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gnyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ga' yang bsgrub par mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang

sel bar mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan rnams thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang

chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos lung bstan pa la bzod pa thob par gyur ro/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu bdun khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /srog chags

'bum lhag tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /

thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas yi rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag cig gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyur cig /

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa mi chod pa yang thob par gyur cig ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa

bstan pa 'di legs par smras te/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin to// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las chos kyis

dgab pa 'dod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di skad du khyod chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam zhes zer ba ni lha'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba ni sred pa dang 'dod pa spangs pa yin te/ chos 'di ni

so sor rtogs pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni mig gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ltar mi snang ba yin no/ /chos 'di ni mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no/ /chos 'di

ni yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir mi mthong ba yin no/ /chos 'di ni sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir gzung ba med pa yin no/ /chos 'di

ni yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir

'gro ba med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni brtag cing sel ba dang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni namakha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa yin

no/ /chos 'di ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / ma brtag pa dang / rnam par ma brtag pa

dang / rnam par ma bsgrub pa dang / kun tu ma bstan pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir gnas pa med par gnas pa

yin no/ /chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin no/ /chos 'di ni rnam par rtog

pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /chos 'di ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtag pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu 'phags pa yin no/ /chos 'di

ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir smon pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni rtsa ba yongs su chad pa'i phyir

mi gnas pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni grogs med pa'i phyir mi rten pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni mi rten pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba yin no/ /chos 'di ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni gtan mngon par grub pa med

pa'i phyir sems can med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma byang ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin no/ /chos 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni

mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni gzod ma nas yang dag par rgyun chad pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no/ /chos 'di ni gzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chad pa med pa yin no/ /chos 'di ni mi phyed

pa dang mi snang ba'i phyir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin na/ lha'i bu chos de lta bu la chos kyi dgab pa de lta bu zhig yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'di'i dgab pa ni kun tu 'phro ba med pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu

legs so legs so/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'di'i dgab pa ni gang la lus dang ngag dang / sems kyis rtul ba med pa de lta bu yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni gsag pa med pa yin pas de ni sems rnyog pa can gyis mchod

par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan ma rjesu dran pas sangs rgyas rjesu dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can

yin no/ /sgra dang / skad dang / dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas dge 'dun rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /
nyon mongs pa gtan spong ba rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /skye ba la rten pas lha rjes su dran par byed pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /ma dul ba'i sbyin pa'i
sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /sems can la brten pa'i bzod pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes
rab kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /sems la nges par ma bsam pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can
yin no/ /the rtsom gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa/ can yin no/ /gnyis la gnas pa'i btang snyoms kyi

sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /lus su 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /chos su 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /skye ba dang 'jig par

'du shes pa'i yang dag par spong ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /lus dang sems la rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang po lnga'i sems ni sems

rnyog pa can yin no/ /lta ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /'du byed yid la byed

pa la brtson pa'i lam sgom pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /sdug bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /kun 'byung ba la sgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems

rnyog pa can yin no/ /'gag par zad pa 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /lam la sgom par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin te/ lha'i bu ji tsam du rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa

nyid la sgro 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems rnyog pa med pa gang dag yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag sems namakha' dang mnyam pa dag

go/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal namakha' la sems cung zad kyang yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar namakha' la sems med pa bzhin du sems de yang de dang 'dra ste/ gang gi sems de 'dra ba de ni sems namakha'

dang mnyam pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnas de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag

par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang sems namakha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rtag par

byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ /mi rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bdag dang / bdag med par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ /stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gang zag

ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ /mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ /sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / brag cha dang / chu zla dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa'i dpe nye bar

dgod pa dag gi chos rnam par 'jog par byed/ mtshon par byed/ 'jug par byed/ ston par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ /de ji tsam du chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la

skyon du byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba la skyon med par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no/ /'khor ba la skyon du lta bar byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la phan yon du lta bar byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin te/ lha'i

bu de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyis lhag par byed pa dag yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i

dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa bsrubs te gnas kyang 'gog pa 'gog par yang mi byed la/ skye ba med pa bskyed par yang mi byed cing / sgra thams cad kyis skrag par yang mi byed la/ kun nas nyon mongs

pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de ltar shes shing chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu nyi khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /

dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud med nyis stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /

de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tsom ci yod pa dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig /de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ji zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la

bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi 'khrug pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no/ /'od srung chen pos smras pa/ 'jam

dpal ci las bsam te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/ mtha' ni ngar 'dzin pa yin/ gnas ni khams gsum pa yin/ 'khrugs pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams yin/
mi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/ de la des lus ni rtsa ba med par shes/ ngar 'dzin pa ni mtha' med par shes/ khams gsum ni gnas med par shes/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni mi 'khrug par shes/ bsam gtan rnams ni

gnyis su med par shes pas na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po kho bos de las bsam nas dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi 'khrug

pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam gtan byed pa yin no zhes smras so/ /sha ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/

btsun pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad la spyod par byed kyang chags pa thams cad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad la mngon sum du byed kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de

dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag kyang spong bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no/ /maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

rdzu 'phrul che ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang ma thob/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma thob la slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams kyang 'dul bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang

chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'

chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes par byed la/ pha rol dang tshu rol dang bral bar byed cing / byang chub kyi sgrib pa yang mi spong la ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi ldang zhing bya ba thams cad ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' nyon

mongs pa med par gnas pa yin no/ /byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dbang po thams cad kyis spobs

par byed cing 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed la/ bskal pa stong phrag rnams su don dang / tshig dang / yi ge ston pa rnams kyis rgyas par ston par byed kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems

dpa' chos ston pa yin no/ /nam grus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nam gru gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa

nyid yin par yang shes par byed la sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du spyod par byed cing bsam gtan la gnas pa las g.yo bar mi 'gyur na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan

pa yin no/ /nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams gtan dul ba nyid du yang shes par byed

cing ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa dang bral la/ ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyir chos ston par byed cing / de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams rtogs par yang byed la byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no/ /

ma 'gag pas smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ma 'gag pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i gzugs snang ba thams cad kyang mthong bar byed

la/ gzugs dben par mthong bas chos thams cad dben par mthong ba ste/ rtogs par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin no/ /ba ku las smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po

bsrung ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par lta zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul yang med par lta na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrung ba yin na/ /sor mo'i

phreng bas smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir mtsham med pa dang mnyam par lta bar byed na de tsam

gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no/ /ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po gang

gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa bzhi thob cing / tshig gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rgya cher rnam par 'byed cing ston la/ ci nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba len

par mi byed pa de ltar ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid gnas pa las kyang mi g.yo la gnas thams cad la yang mi rten pa de ltar ston par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /gsus po che chen pos smras

pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag rig pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i don gyis don so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa

nyid kyis chos so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / ming dang mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / brag cha dang mnyam pa nyid kyis spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ston par byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems

dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin no/ /sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshul

khrims dang brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs shing sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro bar byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin no/ /kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'jam

dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs par nyan par byed cing thos pa thams cad kyi don kyang rtogs par byed

la/ ji ltar thos pa yang 'dzin par byed cing / ji ltar gzung ba bzhin ston par yang byed na de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin no/ /de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad smras so/ /tshe dang ldan

pa dag khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad bstan pa de lta bu'i chos 'ga' dang ldan nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag cag la ni chos de dag las 'ga' tsam yang med do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta na

khyed cag nyan thos chen po mchog tu gyur pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ram/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gnag rjes las brten na rdzing bu mchog yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos gzhan dag las brten na kho bo cag kyang mchog yin

no/ /'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po las brten na 'og gi chu'i phung po mchog yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las brten na byang chub sems dpa' mchog yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ btsun pa sha ri'i bus

de ni nyan thos mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin te/ legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ nyan thos ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i

nga rgyal can yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsam te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni sangs rgyas la brten nas nga rgyal spangs pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'

ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin la nga rgyal des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrub par byed pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ni bdag la

bstod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang de lta bur mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag la bstod par byed cing gzhan la smod par byed

pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsam te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i

bsngags pa ma yin par rjod par byed pa dang / ji ltar sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur snyam nas bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos brjod par byed cing / 'di la dga' ba'i sems bskyed par ma 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas theg

pa dman pa la rnam par sdang bar byed pa yin pas lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la stod par byed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub

sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nor bu mching bu'i bsngags pa ma yin par brjod cing nor bu rin po che bai dur+ya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na de yang ltung ba dang bcas

par 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin brjod

par byed pa yang ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gang zhig gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod cing khams kyi rgyal po la de lta ma yin na/

de smad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam mam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la stod par byed cing nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod

par byed pa yang smad pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so/ /khyod kyi tshig de ni legs par smras te/ 'jam dpal

theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas ni theg pa thams cad kyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal theg pa thams cad ni de las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi

nyon mongs pa la brten nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/

lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin du zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas go ca gyon par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ci zhig la rten/

'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rten to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus

smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ci la rten/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni rtsa ba med pa'i gnas la rten pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa dang /

mngon par skabs yod pa dang / nam mkha' la rten pa yang yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyed yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ji snyed pa de snyed yod do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas pas na lha'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de snyed do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /

gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i

gnas rjesu rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam grangs med pas

sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyis rnam grangs kyis ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can thams cad rtogs par thugasu chud pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar rtogs par

thugs su chud/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can med pa'i rnam pa dang stong pa nyid kyis rnam pas so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid kyis ci zhig rtogs par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/

lha'i bu gal te cung zad rjesu rtogs par byed na ni de stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa dang rtsol ba med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas stong pa

nyid rjesu rtogs pa ni byang chub yin no zhes ma gsungs sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong pa nyid rjesu rtogs pa kho na byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so/

lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ji zhig la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po dang / khams

dang / skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ lus dang sems la gnas pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de gnas pa gang gis gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de yang stong pas na stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus

smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas par mi mdzad dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa yin

pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i gnas pas gnas par mdzad do/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis su med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa ni

gnyis su med pa nyid yin gyi/ de la gnas pa gzhan med de/ de'i gnas pa gnyis su med pa las gzhan med pa de nyid kyang gnyis su med pa nyid yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis shes bya ba ni gang / gnyis su med pa zhes

bya ba ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa de ni gnyis so/ /'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/ /zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med par byed pa de ni gnyis so/ /zhe sdang gi

rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/ /gti mug dang gti mug med par byed pa de ni gnyis so/ /gti mug gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa dang nyon mongs pa med par byed pa de ni gnyis so/ /nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni gnyis

su med pa'o/ /bdag dang bdag med par byed pa de ni gnyis so/ /bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi rang bzhin gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin

ni gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa nyid yin no/ /bdag gi rang bzhin ni gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir gzod ma nas dben pa nyid dang / gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid dang / gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/

'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /de ni gzod ma nyid nas gsal zhing nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /de ni/

nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /de ni spros pa dang bral ba dang / de ni rgyu ba dang bral ba dang / de ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ /de ni blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes

bya'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin mi shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes pa dag go/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin shes pa

dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag de dag gi rang bzhin shes pa dag go/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i

mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong dad pa dang mi ldan pa ji ltar dad pas byin pa la dad par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang mi ldan pa

zhes bya ba ni gang mngon sum du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing gzhan gyi dad pas yang dang yang du mi 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ni dad pas byin pa spyod par mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de la ji skad ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni des

ma 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yin

pa'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig gnas par gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dus ma byas thob nas sems can rnams skyob

par mi byed cing nyan thos su 'gyur bas de'i nyes pa ni der 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus byas ni so so skye bo'i sa yin la/ 'dus ma byas ni 'phags pa rnams kyi sa yin na/ 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i

sa spangs shing so so skye bo'i sa la gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la yang mi gnas/ 'dus ma byas la yang mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi

sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed las yid bskyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas la mi gnas pa yin pas 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pa yin te/

de 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral bas ni 'dus byas la mi gnas la 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pas ni 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ tshan po che chen pos steng gi bar snang la mda' 'phangs par gyur la/

de nas mda' de namakha' la mi gnas par 'dug cing sa la yang mi ltung na/ lha'i bu de la dka' ba cung zad yod dam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dka'o/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang mi spong zhing 'dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la/ 'dus ma byas su yang mi ltung zhing 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ni ches dka' ba yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam

dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig pa 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas sam/ gang las 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyiso smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/

'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dus byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jig pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jig pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/

'jam dpal nyon mongs pa med pas 'jig pa ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jig pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum du nyon mongs par mi byed na/ de ni nyan thos

su 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi shes pas 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing / thabs

kyi shes pas 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos la

lta bas 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas la sbyor bar

byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas la

gnas te bsam gtan rnams skyed par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi

sems la gnas te dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub

sems dpa' dben pa la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems

dpa' byams pa chen po la gnas te chos ston par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor

ba la gnas te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su spyad pa'i las byed cing / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas te 'khor ba yongasu spyad pa'i las byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang

chub sems dpa' skye ba med pas skye bar byed cing 'pho ba med pas 'byung bar byed pa dang / chos la lta bas snang bar byed cing phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang / thams cad dang rjesu 'brel zhing zhi ba dang nye bar

zhi bar gyur pa dang / 'bar bar byed cing 'bar bas tshig par mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad la yongs su sbyong bar byed cing nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing nyan thos kyi

rnam par grol ba la reg par mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug cing chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi lcag kyu shes par byed cing chos kyi lcag kyu spong bar mi byed pa dang / shes pas 'jug par byed cing /

thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rnam pa ston par byed cing 'phags pa ma yin pa yongasu smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngon par dga' bar byed cing chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis na

byang chub sems dpa' 'jig pa med pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /lha'i bu nyi khri lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa

rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni spobs pa thogs pa med pa skyes so/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi

skye dgu las srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i mchod pa dag byas so/ /gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la 'dod chags dang

bral ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la zhe sdang spong ba mngon du mi byed pa dang / gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la gti mug spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos

ston par yang byed la nyon mongs pa spong ba mngon du yang mi byed pa tsam gyis na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la stong pa nyid ston par yang byed la/

stong pa nyid mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la mtshan ma med pa ston par yang byed la mtshan ma med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la smon pa med pa mngon du yang mi byed pa dang /

de bzhin du sems can rnams la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos ston par yang byed la 'gog pa mngon du yang mi byed pa de

tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / brjed nges pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /

bems po dang / lug ltar lkug pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsam te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras

pa/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang / byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang /

dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhi po de dag yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do/ /lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba de ni de'i rang bzhin

ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par 'da' bas shes rab dang / shes rab las yang dag par 'da' bas rnam par grol ba shes pa sgrub par byed de/

lha'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs des gang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las

log par zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa yin pas de ni theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin na/

lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi rtul bar mi byed cing ngag dang sems kyis rtul bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la/ gang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no/ /lha'i

bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni rmi lam na yang sa gnyis po dag la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pas de ni brjed nges pa yin la/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brjed ngas pa de ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par bzhag

pa yin pas de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no/ /lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ rtswa dang / shing dang / brtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor dang / lug ltar lkug pa dang / 'dra bar rang bzhin

gyis nus pa med pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ye shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad bems po dang / lug ltar lkug pa lta bus byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed

pa yin te/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lam sgrub par byed pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang mi spong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang /

lam gyi las kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing lam gyi bya ba yang sgrub par byed pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam la 'god par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/ /lha'i bu

gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang chos thams cad btsal yang mi rnyed pa dang / byang chub kyi lam spong bar mi byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod pa bsam gtan byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa'

byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la nyan thos kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la rang

sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par byed la lam des kyang dbang po yongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas

pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi gnyer ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang / dge

ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir 'phel ba yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba dang / 'bri ba yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas

pa yin no/ /lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongasu tshol bar byed pa dang / lam yongasu btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa

yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'

ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang

mi mthun pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed kyang nyon mongs pa med pa nyid du

mi ltung ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba ston par byed kyang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'byung ba med par shes shing skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la yongs su spyod par byed kyang phung po dang / khams

dang / skye mched don du mi gnyer ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston kyang yongs su shes pa de dag yongs su shes par mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar

pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par bsgrub par byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa rnams nye bar 'jog par byed kyang nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul nye bar ston par byed kyang

bdud kyi las rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par mi byed pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye

bar len par byed pas na de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag gi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig /'jam dpal

gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bsam pa yongasu dag cing nang dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la spyod pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang / sems mi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjed

pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang / sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang / rmas pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang / lus dben pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa

dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la spyod pa dang / spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang / sems can la bdag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin par

rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la spyod pa dang / gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtog pa la

spyod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phyin ci log rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la so sor rtogs pa la spyod pa dang / 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtog

pa la spyod pa dang / phung po sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongasu shes pa la spyod pa dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa'i phyir 'gog pa shes pa la spyod pa dang /

'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu yongs su shes pa nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa dang / du ma'i phyir tshogs pa la spyod pa dang /

brjod du med pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang /

brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / tshig 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes la rton pa la spyod pa dang / las kyi rnam par

smin pa stong pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rten pa la spyod pa dang / gang zag yongasu smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la rton pa la spyod pa dang / las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i

rna ba la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa la spyod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / sems la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub

pa la spyod pa dang / mi phyed pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan pa la spyod pa dang / mi lhod pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la spyod pa dang / bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa la spyod pa dang / tha dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod pa mnyam pa la spyod pa dang / thams

cad rjes su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / namakha' lta bur spyod pa dang / rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir sgyu ma lta bu la spyod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa

dang / rnam par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang / bdag mi sred pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / sems rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa dang / khams gsum rang bzhin

med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar bcad pa

la spyod pa dang / spyod pa thams cad rnam par bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcod pa la spyod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// //

bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/

lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / gang brgyad pa ma yin pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin

pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma yin pa dang / gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang /

ston pa de ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o/ /lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gti mug gi chos

can ma yin pa dang / gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji las bsam te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal ji ltar

na byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjesu 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / ston pa dang / so so skye bo'i chos can dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can dang / zhe sdang gi chos can dang / gti mug gi chos can dang / 'khor ba'i chos can

dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad par byed pa dang / chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de chags par mi 'gyur ba

dang / gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa skyed cing 'dzin par byed pa dang / chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams thar bar byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba la

chags par mi byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjesu 'brang ba yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/ 'jam

dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin par byed pa dang / kun 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi zas med pa dang / chos la gnas kyi nyon

mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang / chos kyi stobs can yin gyi nga rgyal gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gtam smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang /

chos la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi chos ma yin par mi smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la rton pa yin gyi brtson pa btang ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid du chos thams

cad shes par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / nor bdun dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi

rjes su 'brang ba yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' log pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa dang /

yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas pa dang / lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang / sbyor ba yongasu ma rdzogs par lam nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams dal ba phun sum

tshogs pa dag la 'god par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtogs pa brgyad la gnas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mi spong ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems

dpa' brgyad pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyun phyogs su dad pa rnams

rgyun las zlog par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad kyang gcod par byed la 'khor ba mi gcod pa dang / ngan song thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa dang / sems can rnams bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god

par byed pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / lha dang / mi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa ston par byed pa dang / rlom sems su mi ltung ba dang / the rtsom dang bral ba dang / nges pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so skye

bo'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa dang / 'dus byas la

snang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pas rab tu phye ba dang / phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu zhugs pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar

na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med par shes nas sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bsam

bzhin du 'ong ba dang / sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med par mthong ba dang / 'ongs yang nyon mongs pa med pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi las

yongs su dag pas 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba mnyam pa nyid mi spong ba dang / bdud kyi dbang gis mi 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / nye bar blangs pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang / byang chub

kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sra zhing mi phyed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i

bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rnams dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams su yang mi 'ong ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro

bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byas pa nges par ma gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par mi 'ong ba dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa dang / rga shi med pa la thob pa dang / mthor gnas pa dang / byas pa

dris pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / rnam pa med pa thob pa dang / shes pas gzhan la rag ma las pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal

ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med cing 'dod chags gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sdang ba med cing zhe sdang

gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / rmongs pa med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad la

sems ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dga' ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang pad ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis ma gos

pa dang / shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam pa dang / thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang / nye bar len pa thams cad la bdag gi med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir

byed cing yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med par gnas par byed pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa dag la brnag pa yongasu

rdzogs pa dang / tshur rol dang pha rol la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol du son pa dang / tshu rol gyi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gzhan gyis sems can gzhan thar bar byed pa de ltar lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin no/ /lha'i su

bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la ma thos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing yul rnams la spyod

par mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang / rgyu dang / rkyen dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med par sgrogs par byed pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang / namakha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / ye shes chen po la chos thams cad rgyus nye bar 'gro bar rtsoms shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang /

sgrogs pa yang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / thos pas kyang rlom sems mi byed pa dang / sgrogs pa thams cad kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi chad pa yongasu shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa thob pa dang don dang tshig dang yig

'bru mi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / shes par ston par byed pa dang / so so ci rig par chos ston par byed pa dang / zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi spyod pa de lta na lha'i bu byang

chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang /

sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / rnam par bsgrub pas shes rab gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta ste/

pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i phyogs dang / mngon par shes pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang / de rkyen nye bar

bsgrub par byed cing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag las sems skyo bar byed pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa

dang / chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub

sems dpa' chos thams cad gzod ma nas dben pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtog par byed pa dang / ming mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang / mchog dang / bar

ma thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / rang gi nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyi sa dang spyod pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang /

mos pas chos ston par byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/

lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin nyid mi brjed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang /

de bzhin nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang / de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi smon lam dang / de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan

pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med pa dang / sems can yongasu thar bar byed pa dang / sems can gyi gnas dang / 'khor ba na yang spyod la spyod pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang / don yang yin

la don yang ma yin pa dang / 'di na yang yin la 'di na yang ma yin pa dang / gnyis ka las dag pa dang / mun pa dang bral ba dang / rtag tu gsal ba dang / mun pa med pa dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes

su song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya/

'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa bcom pa dang chu bo las rgal ba dang / srid pa mthong ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi khur dang / srid pa 'jom pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral

ba dang / bdud bcom pa dang / khur bor ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba shes pa dang / bya ba shes pa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags bsal ba dang / lus dang sems sgom pa dang / tshul khrims dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / srid

pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang / sems can la bsam pa ma btang ba dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba dang / chu lon dang zam pa legs par byas pa dang / mi gnas pas legs par gnas pa rtag tu

sgoms pa la yid kyis brtson pa dang sems can gyi srid pa sra bar byed pa dang / srid pa thams cad las rnam par logs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar rlogs par byed pa dang / srid pas rnam par

brtse ba la mkhas pa dang / srid pa gsum na yod pa rnams kyis mchod pa de ltar na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shes bya'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'tshams med pa gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa rnams dang

phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams dang / chod pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang

mnyam pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / slob pa'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams

dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid rnam par 'khrug par mi byed pa dang /

rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen la rag las pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam

pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis

smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang la ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yos pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / bstan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang / gling dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang /

nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / the rtsom dang bral ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi the rtsom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gis phyag byas pa dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / khams gsum pas phyag

byas pa dang / sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing khengs pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / bshung ba dang / khro ba dang / skyo ba dang / bsdig pa thams cad dang /

rlom sems thams cad kyis zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin legs par mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba dang / 'jig rten la ston par grags par 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub

sems dpa' stan pa yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so skye bo'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyi so so skye bo'i spyod pa

thams cad kyang ston par byed la shes pas so so skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so skye bo'i chos can yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub

sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags

par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa bsgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon par gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su

chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang

gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa'i skyon chags par lta bar byed pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sdang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs

pa thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad la skyon du yang 'du shes la nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'du byed rnams spang bar yang mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyun gcod par ma byed pa dang / snying rje chen

pos yang dag par zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par skyid par byed pa dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab las 'byin par byed pa dang / sems can zhe sdang can rnams

la bzod pa nye bar sgrub par byed cing nyon mongs pa rnams la nyes pa dang / 'chi 'pho'i thabs thams cad dang / 'khor ba sun 'byin par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/

'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa yin pas de la gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la
snyoms par 'jug par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed/ kun tu shes par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed/ 'byung bar mi byed/ 'jig par mi byed/ g.yo bar mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/

bskyod par mi byed/ sa bya rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i

chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la de nyid las kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mongs yin zhing spyod

pa dman pa rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / sems can rnams spyod pa dman pa las phral zhing spyod pa rgya chen po la 'god par byed pa dang / don 'thun par byed pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad la mi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'thun pa bzlog pa dang / phyir zlog

par byed pa dang / byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol bar shes par byed pa dang / 'khor ba mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas pa yang mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'

'khor ba'i chos can yin no/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad
